text: 22 Positive Affirmations To Boost Your Wellbeing - And Even Make You Smarter!

You know that feeling when you're about to give a presentation, and your brain suddenly decides to remind you of that embarrassing moment from 7th grade? Yeah, our brains can be a tad dramatic. But what if there was a way to rewire that drama-loving brain of yours? Enter: positive affirmations.
The Science Behind the Magic ðŸ§

Positive affirmations aren't just some new-age fad. There's genuine theory and a fair amount of neuroscience backing this up. At its core, positive affirmations are positive phrases or statements used to challenge and replace negative or unhelpful thoughts. Think of them as your brain's software update, fixing those annoying bugs (negative thoughts) that pop up at the worst times.
The Perks of Talking to Yourself ðŸŽ¤
Boosts Wellbeing: Positive affirmations can enhance your overall wellbeing, making you feel more relaxed and motivated.
Physical Activity: A study showed that fitness affirmations increased activity in the brain's ventromedial prefrontal cortex, leading to increased physical activity.
Stress-Be-Gone: Affirmations have been shown to decrease health-deteriorating stress.
IQ Level Up: Believe it or not, self-affirmation can boost your IQ by as much as 10 points.
Sleep Like a Baby: Affirmations can help you sleep better by putting you in a better headspace.
